rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: I would totally recommend Dr. Ross! She gives great feedback if you email her your papers and is a really easy grader. She rocks.
ENGL 128 with Heather was one of the easiest classes I've ever taken. She is an extremely easy grader and lets you turn in late work. Felt like high school.
This is the English professor that you want.
Very engaging teacher with really interesting assignments. This subject has great potential to be terrible, but she makes class a lot of fun!
